mapper.update: update read_history set bookid = #{bookid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chapterid = #{chapterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, resouce_type = #{resouceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=CHAR}, chapter_name = #{chapterName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, conver = #{conver,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, bookid, chapterid, author, create_time, resouce_type, uid, chapter_name, content, conver, book_name, desc from read_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, bookid, chapterid, author, create_time, resouce_type, uid, chapter_name, content, conver, book_name, desc from read_history
